p: Thermo Finnigan NIST 02 Libraries software (Thermo Finnigan, Waltham, MA, USA) was applied to the identification of particular components of basil essential oil. Parameters of calibration lines of the selected components (eugenol, linalool, eucalyptol, estragole) present in the basil essential oils were calculated by using Microsoft Excel 2007 (Microsoft Corporation, Redmond, Washington, WA, USA). The program Statistica Cz v. 12 (StatSoft, www.statsoft.cz) was used for the statistical evaluation of the results.
